fAIshion is a browser extension serving as an AI purchasing assistant across all apparel brands. 

 Key Highlights:

1. Right-click on any model pic for instant virtual try-on, catering to diverse body types, ages, and races.

 2.  Input body dimensions for AI size recommendations
